HotelDescription: This polished hotel is 1.4 km from Aga Khan Palace and 6 km from Pune Airport.Featuring Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs, the upscale rooms have minibars, and tea and coffeemakers, along with safes, sofabeds and desks; some have glass-enclosed bathrooms. Upgraded rooms provide free airport shuttle service, plus access to a lounge offering complimentary breakfast and evening cocktails. Suites add separate living rooms. Room service is 24/7.

This upscale hotel is a 4-minute walk from the nearest bus stop, 1.5 km from Aga Khan Palace and 8 km from the fortress of Shaniwar Wada. The modern rooms feature flat-screen TVs, iPod docks and minibars, plus tea and coffeemaking facilities; some also include free Wi-Fi. Suites add balconies with city views, as well as sitting areas, dining tables and access to a private lounge. There's 24-hour room service.

This informal hotel surrounded by business parks is 2 km from both Pune International Airport and the 19th-century Aga Khan Palace, where Gandhi was imprisoned. Understated, warmly decorated rooms come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minibars, plus tea and coffeemaking facilities. Suites add living rooms. Room service is available 24/7.

Along the NH3 and surrounded by a green lawn, this unassuming hotel is 2 km from the Keshav Rai Temple, 7 km from the Bajwara Fort and 5 km from Hoshiarpur train station. Featuring dark wood floors and furnishings, the down-to-earth rooms come with flat-screen TVs
